title: Kal Penn on life after 'Harold and Kumar' and finding work
text:
Kal Penn on life after 'Harold and Kumar' and finding work

8:25 AM ET Thu, 26 Sept 2019

To view this site, you need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser, and either the Flash Plugin or an HTML5-Video enabled browser. Download the latest Flash player and try again.

Kal Penn's career took off after 'Harold and Kumar go to White Castle,' but he struggled to find a job after his breakthrough role, even Jamba Juice wouldn't hire him. His new show 'Sunnyside' airs on NBC Thursday nights at 9:30 p.m. ET.
description: Kal Penn's career took off after 'Harold and Kumar go to White Castle,' but he struggled to find a job after his breakthrough role, even Jamba Juice wouldn't hire him. His new show 'Sunnyside' airs on NBC Thursday nights at 9:30 p.m. ET.
